com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.toasts

Class DynamicToast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.toasts.DynamicToast

  • public class DynamicToast
extends Object
    Helper class to display themed toasts with icon and text. If no color is supplied, it will display default toast based on the vanilla Android.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DynamicToast.Config
      Configuration class to customise toast attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • make

        @NonNull
public static Toast make(@NonNull
                                  Context context,
                                  @Nullable
                                  CharSequence text)
        Make a standard toast that just contains a text view. Toast duration will be Toast.LENGTH_SHORT.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually the Application or Activity object.
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        Returns:
        Toast with the supplied parameters. Use Toast.show() to display the toast.

      • make

        @NonNull
public static Toast make(@NonNull
                                  Context context,
                                  @Nullable
                                  CharSequence text,
                                  int duration)
        Make a standard toast that just contains a text view.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually the Application or Activity object.
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG.
        Returns:
        Toast with the supplied parameters. Use Toast.show() to display the toast.

        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.

        @NonNull
public static Toast make(@NonNull
                                  Context context,
                                  @Nullable

                                  @Nullable

                                  int duration)
        Make a themed toast with icon and the text.

        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.

        Toast with the supplied parameters. Use Toast.show() to display the toast.

      • make

        @NonNull
public static Toast make(@NonNull
                                  Context context,
                                  @Nullable
                                  CharSequence text,
                                  int tintColor,
                                  int backgroundColor)
        Make a themed toast with text, toastBackground and the tint color. Toast duration will be Toast.LENGTH_SHORT.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually the Application or Activity object.
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        tintColor - The toast tint color based on the toastBackground. It will automatically check for the contrast to provide best visibility.
        backgroundColor - The toast toastBackground color.
        Returns:
        Toast with the supplied parameters. Use Toast.show() to display the toast.

      • make

        @NonNull
public static Toast make(@NonNull
                                  Context context,
                                  @Nullable
                                  CharSequence text,
                                  int tintColor,
                                  int backgroundColor,
                                  int duration)
        Make a themed toast with text, toastBackground and the tint color. Toast duration will be Toast.LENGTH_SHORT.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually the Application or Activity object.
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        tintColor - The toast tint color based on the toastBackground. It will automatically check for the contrast to provide best visibility.
        backgroundColor - The toast toastBackground color.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG.
        Returns:
        Toast with the supplied parameters. Use Toast.show() to display the toast.

        @NonNull
public static Toast make(@NonNull
                                  Context context,
                                  @Nullable
                                  CharSequence text,
                                  @Nullable
                                  Drawable icon,
                                  int tintColor,
                                  int backgroundColor,
                                  int duration)
        Make a themed toast with text, icon, toastBackground and the tint color.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually the Application or Activity object.
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        icon - The toast icon to show.
        tintColor - The toast tint color based on the toastBackground. It will automatically check for the contrast to provide best visibility.
        backgroundColor - The toast toastBackground color.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG.
        Returns:
        Toast with the supplied parameters. Use Toast.show() to display the toast.
